polycomVSAuthLocation.name: polycomVSAuthLocation
polycomVSAuthLocation.description: The origin of the last attempted admin login. Valid values are 0(local), 1(ftp), 2(telnet) or 3(web).

polycomVSReason.name: polycomVSReason
polycomVSReason.description: The cause code associated with a call disconnecting.

polycomVSPlead.name: polycomVSPlead
polycomVSPlead.description: The contact phone number for the user who sent the help request to GMS.

polycomVSMicData.name: polycomVSMicData
polycomVSMicData.description: The current total connected mic count or VTX status.

polycomVSAutoAnswerSetting.name: polycomVSAutoAnswerSetting
polycomVSAutoAnswerSetting.description: The current user-specified auto answer setting (i.e. Yes, No, Do_Not_Disturb).

polycomVSGDSAddress.name: polycomVSGDSAddress
polycomVSGDSAddress.description: The current global directory server address related to a certain GDS event.

polycomVSGatekeeperAddress.name: polycomVSGatekeeperAddress
polycomVSGatekeeperAddress.description: The current gatekeeper address related to a certain gatekeeper event.

polycomVSPreviousNicType.name: polycomVSPreviousNicType
polycomVSPreviousNicType.description: The previous network interface card type.

polycomVSCurrentNicType.name: polycomVSCurrentNicType
polycomVSCurrentNicType.description: The current network interface card type.

polycomVSNicLineNumber.name: polycomVSNicLineNumber
polycomVSNicLineNumber.description: The V.35 or ISDN line number related to a certain line event.

polycomVSPreviousNicLineCount.name: polycomVSPreviousNicLineCount
polycomVSPreviousNicLineCount.description: The total nic line count (i.e. ISDN Quad BRI = 4 lines).

polycomVSCurrentNicLineCount.name: polycomVSCurrentNicLineCount
polycomVSCurrentNicLineCount.description: The current nic line count (i.e. ISDN Quad BRI = 4 lines).

polycomVSV35PortsEnabled.name: polycomVSV35PortsEnabled
polycomVSV35PortsEnabled.description: The current user specified V.35 ports enabled setting (i.e. 1, 1+2, none).

polycomVSAuthClientAddress.name: polycomVSAuthClientAddress
polycomVSAuthClientAddress.description: The address of the login client.

polycomVSUPnPStatus.name: polycomVSUPnPStatus
polycomVSUPnPStatus.description: The current status of the UPnP device.

polycomVSPercentPacketLoss.name: polycomVSPercentPacketLoss
polycomVSPercentPacketLoss.description: The current combined (audio/video) average percentage packet loss when in an H.323 call.

polycomVSJitter.name: polycomVSJitter
polycomVSJitter.description: The current combined (audio/video) cumulative average jitter (in ms) when in an H.323 call.

polycomVSLatency.name: polycomVSLatency
polycomVSLatency.description: The current average latency based on round trip delay when in an H.323 call.

loginOK.name: loginOK
loginOK.description: Sent when an administrator logs in via embedded UI, ftp, telnet or web.

loginFail.name: loginFail
loginFail.description: Sent when an attempt to log in as an administrator fails via embedded UI, ftp, telnet or web.

lowBattery.name: lowBattery
lowBattery.description: Sent when the remote has a low battery.

callUp.name: callUp
callUp.description: When a call is successfully connected, this notifies the SNMP manager of the far site number.

callDown.name: callDown
callDown.description: When a call is disconnected with normal call clearing, this notifies the SNMP manager of the far site number.

callFail.name: callFail
callFail.description: When a call is disconnected with a cause code other than normal, this notifies the SNMP manager of the reason.

userAssist.name: userAssist
userAssist.description: Sent when a user sends a help request to GMS.

visualConcertUp.name: visualConcertUp
visualConcertUp.description: Sent when a visual concert pod is connected.

visualConcertOff.name: visualConcertOff
visualConcertOff.description: Sent when a visual concert pod is disconnected.

micChange.name: micChange
micChange.description: Sent when a mic pod or VTX is connected or disconnected and includes the total mic count.

autoAnswerChange.name: autoAnswerChange
autoAnswerChange.description: Sent when the auto answer setting is changed.

timeServerUp.name: timeServerUp
timeServerUp.description: Sent when the time server successfully connects.

timeServerDown.name: timeServerDown
timeServerDown.description: Sent when the time server is enabled but does not connect correctly.

timeServerOn.name: timeServerOn
timeServerOn.description: Sent when the time server is enabled.

timeServerOff.name: timeServerOff
timeServerOff.description: Sent when the time server is disabled.

gdsUp.name: gdsUp
gdsUp.description: Sent when a global directory server successfully connects.

gdsDown.name: gdsDown
gdsDown.description: Sent when a global directory server is enabled, but not connected correctly.

gdsOff.name: gdsOff
gdsOff.description: Sent when a global directory server is disabled.

gatekeeperReg.name: gatekeeperReg
gatekeeperReg.description: Sent when a gatekeeper is registered successfully.

gatekeeperDown.name: gatekeeperDown
gatekeeperDown.description: Sent when a gatekeeper is specified, but not registered successfully.

gatekeeperOff.name: gatekeeperOff
gatekeeperOff.description: Sent when a gatekeeper is disabled.

ipAddressChange.name: ipAddressChange
ipAddressChange.description: Sent when the system IP address has changed.

interfaceTypeChange.name: interfaceTypeChange
interfaceTypeChange.description: Sent when the system network interface card type has changed.

lineEnabled.name: lineEnabled
lineEnabled.description: Sent when a V.35 or ISDN line has been enabled.

lineDisabled.name: lineDisabled
lineDisabled.description: Sent when a V.35 or ISDN line has been disabled.

lineUp.name: lineUp
lineUp.description: Sent when a V.35 or ISDN line has been enabled and becomes available for placing a call.

lineDown.name: lineDown
lineDown.description: Sent when a V.35 or ISDN line has been enabled, but is not working correctly.

v35PortsEnabled.name: v35PortsEnabled
v35PortsEnabled.description: Sent when the V.35 enabled ports setting has changed.

lineCountChange.name: lineCountChange
lineCountChange.description: Sent when the total of available V.35 or ISDN lines has changed.

mainCameraUp.name: mainCameraUp
mainCameraUp.description: Sent when the main camera is working correctly.

mainCameraDown.name: mainCameraDown
mainCameraDown.description: Sent when the main camera is not working correctly.

upnpChange.name: upnpChange
upnpChange.description: Sent when the state of the UPnP device changes.

percentPacketLossExcessive.name: percentPacketLossExcessive
percentPacketLossExcessive.description: Sent when the combined tx/rx percentage of packet loss exceeds 1 percent based on 1 minute samples.

jitterExcessive.name: jitterExcessive
jitterExcessive.description: Sent when the combined tx/rx average jitter exceeds 35 ms based on 1 minute samples.

latencyExcessive.name: latencyExcessive
latencyExcessive.description: Sent when the combined tx/rx average latency exceeds 150 ms based on 1 minute samples.
